goals__remit: The Maastricht Centre for Taxation (MCT) is an interdisciplinary educational and research centre dedicated to international and European taxation. Maastricht University’s Faculty of Law and its School of Business and Economics have joined forces to combine current educational programmes and to combine research expertise in tax law, (tax) accounting and public finance. With a dedicated tax staff of about 35 persons, the MCT strives to maintain its high level of tax education and to focus its interdisciplinary tax-related research.
